column3:
ACK

Loosely related comment: I see that this call (and the (Get|Set)StartOnSystemStartup functions) could be moved to the UI code initialization (qt/bitcoin.cpp) instead of clutter the core code with a QT_GUI guard.
@laanwj That's a thing you should do, but sounds like a very good idea :).\n
Erm, why make a useful comment less useful? The purpose of that code is to remove old wxBitcoin shortcut links... so the "bitcoin-wx" note is correct.\n
This removes the current Shortcut (Bitcoin.lnk) and as we don't have wx anymore this is correct, no?\n
